scripts.check: npm ci && npx eslint "src/**/*.{ts,tsx,js,jsx}" --fix && npx prettier --write "src/**/*.{ts,tsx,js,jsx,json,md,css}" && (npm audit fix || true) && npx vite build
scripts.prepare: node -e "if (process.env.FETCH_PYODIDE === '1') { console.log('Fetching pyodide assets (FETCH_PYODIDE=1)'); require('child_process').execSync('node scripts/fetch-pyodide.js', { stdio: 'inherit' }); } else { console.log('Skipping fetch-pyodide (set FETCH_PYODIDE=1 to enable).'); }"
scripts.deploy: if command -v gh >/dev/null 2>&1; then gh workflow run deploy.yml --repo pargame/MyBlog --ref main && echo 'Dispatched deploy.yml via gh'; elif [ -n "$GH_TOKEN" ]; then curl -sSf -X POST -H "Accept: application/vnd.github+json" -H "Authorization: token $GH_TOKEN" https://api.github.com/repos/pargame/MyBlog/actions/workflows/deploy.yml/dispatches -d '{"ref":"main"}' && echo 'Dispatched deploy.yml via GH_TOKEN'; else echo 'gh CLI not available and GH_TOKEN not set. Install gh or set GH_TOKEN.'; exit 1; fi
